m:MaterialTitle.title: Autocomplete
m:MaterialTitle.description: Use GWT Autocomplete to search for matches from local or remote data sources. We used MultiWordSuggestOracle to populate the list to be added on the autocomplete values

blockquote.p: You can click the chips to select it.
Perform any keyboard actions like pressing KEY DELETE and KEY BACKSPACE to remove it from the autocomplete values
By calling automcomplte.getItemValues() you will retrieve all the items that is currently on the Autocomplete Field
If the value is already exist, we automatically remove it when adding
You can add an unknown value by typing new one then PRESS ENTER
To disable , add enabled="false" parameter on the autocomplete widget

m:MaterialTitle.title: Gist Files
m:MaterialTitle.description: With the given example, we use UserOracle, User and UserSuggestion in order to build the Autocomplete more flexible.

m:MaterialTitle.title: Events
m:MaterialTitle.description: You can easily add Value Change Event and Selection Event on autocomplete component.

g:HTMLPanel.demo:PrettyPre:
<acList.addSelectionHandler(new SelectionHandler<SuggestOracle.Suggestion>() {

             @Override

             public void onSelection(SelectionEvent<SuggestOracle.Suggestion> event) {

              MaterialToast.fireToast(event.getSelectedItem().getDisplayString() + " Selected");

             }

            });


            acList.addValueChangeHandler(new ValueChangeHandler<List<? extends SuggestOracle.Suggestion>>() {

             @Override

             public void onValueChange(ValueChangeEvent<List<? extends SuggestOracle.Suggestion>> event) {

              for(SuggestOracle.Suggestion user : event.getValue()){

               MaterialToast.fireToast(user.getDisplayString());

              }

             }

            });

m:MaterialTitle.title: Clearing Items on Autocomplete
m:MaterialTitle.description: You can easily clear the Autocomplete List Items by calling autocomlete.clear()

m:MaterialTitle.title: Type TEXT
m:MaterialTitle.description: Type TEXT is just an alternative for combo box component.

m:MaterialTitle.title: Limiting Items
m:MaterialTitle.description: You can limit the autocomplete items by adding limit='2' attribute.

m:MaterialTitle.title: Inside Modal
m:MaterialTitle.description: You can build your overlay inside the modal

g:HTMLPanel.demo:PrettyPre:
<m:MaterialModal ui:field="modal">
<m:MaterialModalContent>
<m:MaterialTitle title="Select contacts" description="Some description here..."/>
<ma:autocomplete.MaterialAutoComplete ui:field="acModal" placeholder="Contacts"/>
</m:MaterialModalContent>
<m:MaterialModalFooter textAlign="RIGHT">
<m:MaterialButton ui:field="btnClose" text="Close" type="FLAT" textColor="black" waves="DEFAULT"/>
</m:MaterialModalFooter>
</m:MaterialModal>
